source.name: q4
source.instructions:
You have set up an Application Load Balancer (ALB) to distribute incoming traffic across 2 instances.
But when you test how is the load being balanced by performing requests from multiple regions, you've noticed that requests are always routed to the same EC2 instance.

Which of the below best match the root cause?

answers.answer: The ALB was created in a single AZ.
One of the instances has failed to pass the health checks.
